q: the award is "unusual" for an executive who is transitioning out of the CEO role, said David Wise, senior principal at management consulting firm Hay Group. But given Eric Schmidt 's success, the board clearly wants to retain his guidance for the next four years. Eric Schmidt , 55, is being replaced as Google's CEO by co-founder Larry Page. Page, 37, takes over the CEO role in April. Purchase Photos Other
